articles.title: Ukrainian sailor arrested for partially sinking luxury yacht of his Russian boss in Spain - The Independent
articles.description: The Lady Anastasia is a 156-foot, £5.8m boat with five cabins owned by Alexander Mijeev
articles.content:
A Ukrainian sailor in Spains Mallorca has been arrested for partially sinking a yacht worth 7m (£5.8m) owned by a Russian tycoon, days after Russia invaded Ukraine.
